segments.text: I can't believe what I'm seeing; this is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying a plate like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Doesn't she see the water overflowing, creating a huge mess on the floor?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the kids, they're being so naughty, trying to steal cookies like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is going to fall and hurt himself, and it'll be all her fault for not paying attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the stool wobbling, and it makes me so mad that she's not doing anything about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just as guilty, encouraging her brother to take those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they have any idea how dangerous this situation is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is going to cause so much damage, and she's just going to stand there, doing nothing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like shouting at her, telling her to wake up and take control of the situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is just unacceptable; someone needs to step in and put an end to this madness.
segments.speaker: PAR
